positions.subtitle: ITC Limited
positions.description: Promoted as the ‘Youngest Head of Operations’ to lead operations for North East Nutrients Pvt. Ltd - Joint venture of ITC Limited & SRD Group, managing a team of total 38 managers and 700 workers • Reported directly to the Board of Directors of the company and was responsible to liaise with superiors to make decisions for operational activities and setting strategic goals to drive profitability and to ensure highest serviceability levels• Responsible for increasing ITC’s market share and product serviceability in the North East Indian market and neighbouring countries • Led the team successfully to turnaround the company performance by bringing about 10% increase in profits through systematic technical and administrative interventions • Led the operational stabilisation and launch of 2 new packaging format change as a part of brands's aggressive push to consolidate and make inroads in north eastern markets
positions.title: Head Of Operations
positions.description_html:
Promoted as the ‘Youngest Head of Operations’ to lead operations for North East Nutrients Pvt. Ltd - Joint venture of ITC Limited & SRD Group, managing a team of total 38 managers and 700 workers


• Reported directly to the Board of Directors of the company and was responsible to liaise with superiors to make decisions for operational activities and setting strategic goals to drive profitability and to ensure highest serviceability levels
• Responsible for increasing ITC’s market share and product serviceability in the North East Indian market and neighbouring countries
• Led the team successfully to turnaround the company performance by bringing about 10% increase in profits through systematic technical and administrative interventions
• Led the operational stabilisation and launch of 2 new packaging format change as a part of brands's aggressive push to consolidate and make inroads in north eastern markets

positions.subtitle: ITC Limited
positions.description: Managed operations and implemented automation projects for niche manufacturing setup at Haridwar Unit of ITC’s Sunfeast Biscuit & Cakes Category with annual revenue of $40.5 million • Led a team of 18 Technical Managers and Executives managing day-to-day operations of entire production (total annual capacity 33200 metric tons) involving a total of 850 workers in a unionized factory setupMy team was involved in highly dynamic and growing operations to support ITCs aggressive Innovation and NPD led portfolio expansion. Other challenges included absorbing new technologies and developing the workforce to cope with rapidly growing complexity and ever-rising consumer demand for quality
positions.title: Assistant Manager - Manufacturing
positions.description_html:
Managed operations and implemented automation projects for niche manufacturing setup at Haridwar Unit of ITC’s Sunfeast Biscuit & Cakes Category with annual revenue of $40.5 million

• Led a team of 18 Technical Managers and Executives managing day-to-day operations of entire production (total annual capacity 33200 metric tons) involving a total of 850 workers in a unionized factory setup

My team was involved in highly dynamic and growing operations to support ITCs aggressive Innovation and NPD led portfolio expansion. Other challenges included absorbing new technologies and developing the workforce to cope with rapidly growing complexity and ever-rising consumer demand for quality

positions.subtitle: ITC Limited
positions.description: Headed the Quality and Process Excellence Department at Biscuits & Cakes Unit, ITC Haridwar• Led a 18 member analytical and in-line inspection team to consistently deliver superior quality product• Oversaw operational stabilization of two new product format launches and two packaging format changes as a part of the brand’s aggressive product innovation and premiumization drive • Established robust quality systems to bring down consumer complaints  by 70%• Conceptualized, scripted and featured in the ‘Farm to Fork’ documentary which aired on national television (TV Today Network) showcasing the entire factory operations and quality checks involved to ensure the best product reaches to the consumer
positions.title: Assistant Manager - Quality
positions.description_html:
Headed the Quality and Process Excellence Department at Biscuits & Cakes Unit, ITC Haridwar

• Led a 18 member analytical and in-line inspection team to consistently deliver superior quality product
• Oversaw operational stabilization of two new product format launches and two packaging format changes as a part of the brand’s aggressive product innovation and premiumization drive
• Established robust quality systems to bring down consumer complaints by 70%
• Conceptualized, scripted and featured in the ‘Farm to Fork’ documentary which aired on national television (TV Today Network) showcasing the entire factory operations and quality checks involved to ensure the best product reaches to the consumer

positions.subtitle: ITC Limited
positions.description: • Designed and Executed automation projects such as Semi-Automatic Gluing system for 2’s pack of cookies with 3-fold increase in machine throughput and overall line capacity to cater for launch of smaller SKUs in Indian markets with differing demographics•	Designed layouts and prepared a binder for the new upcoming Greenfield factories at Kapurthala and Uluberia to enhance capacities to cater to the objective of -(i)  Improved product freshness by reducing distance to the market (ii) Offering more regional taste preferences to the consumers on the basis of  geographies being served
positions.title: Assistant Manager - Projects
positions.description_html:
• Designed and Executed automation projects such as Semi-Automatic Gluing system for 2’s pack of cookies with 3-fold increase in machine throughput and overall line capacity to cater for launch of smaller SKUs in Indian markets with differing demographics

• Designed layouts and prepared a binder for the new upcoming Greenfield factories at Kapurthala and Uluberia to enhance capacities to cater to the objective of -
(i) Improved product freshness by reducing distance to the market
(ii) Offering more regional taste preferences to the consumers on the basis of geographies being served

positions.subtitle: ITC Limited
positions.description: ● Developed insights in to various elements of brand building like product development, quality, consumer undertaking, media communication etc. through interactive sessions and immersion activities● Visited 6 representative plants to understand manufacturing processes employed in each product category● Trade marketing and Distribution, Hyderabad Branch - Visited over 450 retail stores in urban, semi-urban and rural markets. Understood issues of stock freshness, visibility, credit etc.● Annual Business Planning - Conversion Costing Team ⚬ Predicted the power and fuel costs for FY 14-15 by establishing the correlation between international crude prices and by analyzing trends in historic prices across different locations⚬ Benchamarked key indices - fuel, electricity consumption and mandays per ton across Contract manufacturing units (CMUs) ⚬ Assessed cost impact of product mix change, under-utilization due to portfolio premiumization and setting up of new capacities
positions.title: Management Trainee (MT)

● Developed insights in to various elements of brand building like product development, quality, consumer undertaking, media communication etc. through interactive sessions and immersion activities
● Visited 6 representative plants to understand manufacturing processes employed in each product category
● Trade marketing and Distribution, Hyderabad Branch - Visited over 450 retail stores in urban, semi-urban and rural markets. Understood issues of stock freshness, visibility, credit etc.
● Annual Business Planning - Conversion Costing Team
⚬ Predicted the power and fuel costs for FY 14-15 by establishing the correlation between international crude prices and by analyzing trends in historic prices across different locations
⚬ Benchamarked key indices - fuel, electricity consumption and mandays per ton across Contract manufacturing units (CMUs)
⚬ Assessed cost impact of product mix change, under-utilization due to portfolio premiumization and setting up of new capacities

experience.title: Corporate Intern
experience.description: Offered a Pre Placement Offer (PPO) based on performance in summer internshipThe project involved increasing the uptime of Biomass Gasification unit (renewable source of energy)which used coconut shell as raw material and through its partial combustion generated a producer gas, inturn used to bake biscuits through its combustion in the oven replacing Light Diesel Oil (LDO), a non-renewable sources of energy. ● Increased the uptime of the Biomass Gasification unit by 5% to reduce Light Diesel Oil usage● Designed a new Water Treatment System for the Biomass Gasifiers to bring down the TotalSuspended Solids (TSS levels) from 2000 mg/l to <1 mg/l● Increased the Cooling tower Efficiency by 50%● Developed a new Supply Chain Model for Biomass procurement across India●  Achieved business impact (savings) of $100,000 annually for the unit●  Proposed Models implemented across all the upcoming Gasification units across India
experience.description_html: Offered a Pre Placement Offer (PPO) based on performance in summer internshipThe project involved increasing the uptime of Biomass Gasification unit (renewable source of energy)which used coconut shell as raw material and through its partial combustion generated a producer gas, inturn used to bake biscuits through its combustion in the oven replacing Light Diesel Oil (LDO), a non-renewable sources of energy. ● Increased the uptime of the Biomass Gasification unit by 5% to reduce Light Diesel Oil usage● Designed a new Water Treatment System for the Biomass Gasifiers to bring down the TotalSuspended Solids (TSS levels) from 2000 mg/l to <1 mg/l● Increased the Cooling tower Efficiency by 50%● Developed a new Supply Chain Model for Biomass procurement across India● Achieved business impact (savings) of $100,000 annually for the unit● Proposed Models implemented across all the upcoming Gasification units across India

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: The project involved designing the Supply Chain Logistics model for the Scooter line using Value-Stream Mapping and Visual Mapping techniques ● Reduced Machining time for Scooter model by 45 sec & Improved Man efficiency by 8% for the assembling line operation● Achieved potential business impact (savings) of $47,000 per year
experience.description_html: The project involved designing the Supply Chain Logistics model for the Scooter line using Value-Stream Mapping and Visual Mapping techniques ● Reduced Machining time for Scooter model by 45 sec & Improved Man efficiency by 8% for the assembling line operation● Achieved potential business impact (savings) of $47,000 per year <!---->

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: The project was to assess the feasibility of the temper bead welding in industrial processes. I was a part of the team that carried out live experiments to repair cracks on Coker drums in a running plant.

recommendations: Dipak Shinde “Few people have the opportunity to report to a manager who is also a mentor and a coach, but I did when I worked with Ketan. We worked together for about a year and collaborated on several projects ranging from operations to logistics. His ability to motivate people and steer the team in right direction is outstanding, which is evident in the way he has driven the factory in which we worked together towards sustainable profits. Adding to this, he has a very good connect with the entire team... no matter how tense was the meeting, Ketan always made sure that everyone left with a smile. As member of any team or a manager, Ketan earns my highest recommendation!”

honors_and_awards.title: Campus Recruiter for ITC Limited

honors_and_awards.title: Gold Award at Indian Manufacturing Excellence Award
honors_and_awards.description: The awards assessment process brings out the consonance of Strategic Goals towards Business Growth, their derivative Organizational Objectives towards Enhanced Competitiveness and the facility's Operational Performance towards Manufacturing Effectiveness. The robust and objective on-site assessment methodology based on the Global Manufacturing Excellence Model captures the facility’s operational performance across 12 parameters and business results (for financial and non-financial goals)… Show more

honors_and_awards.title: CII Regional Excellence Award for using Quality Circle as a tool for Business Excellence
honors_and_awards.description: ITC Haridwar Biscuits & Cake Unit stood 2nd amongst 11 teams from across in India in the Northern Chapter for driving culture of continuous improvements in the unit through Quality Circles. A quality circle is a small group of between three and 12 people who do the same or similar work, voluntarily meeting together regularly for about one hour per week in paid time, usually under the leadership of their own supervisor, and trained to identify, analyse and solve some of the problems in… Show more

honors_and_awards.title: Commendation Certificate for Significant Achievement in Food Safety in Large Scale Manufacturing Category
honors_and_awards.description: ITC Haridwar Cakes and Biscuits Unit was the only unit in the country in the Large scale Bakery sector to have received this prestigious award which could only have been achieved through driving constant improvements by involving each worker in his/her own capacity through "Quality Circles" and a consistent push towards highest quality and food safety standards to ensure best product reaches the consumer The CII Award for Food Safety is a prestigious award for recognition towards… Show more

honors_and_awards.title: Runners Up - IGNITE Super Saver Challenge 2014 at ITC Limited (Biennial Inter-category Innovation Forum)
honors_and_awards.description: Won 2nd prize out of 131 teams across 10 categories in the entire Foods Business Division in the IGNITE Challenge 2014 (Biennial Inter-Category Innovation Forum) for the project - "Zero mono carton (outer carton in which single biscuit packs go) openings of biscuit packs in the Indian market" The outer packaging of the product is the first interface of product with the consumer. These cartons tend to be vulnerable in summers in India especially when temperatures peak at 50 deg. at some… Show more

honors_and_awards.title: Gold - Interhostel Weightifting Competition
